What is SearchBoost.ai?

SearchBoost.ai tackles relevancy by focusing on the users and their experience - after all it is them who will consume search results. SearchBoost.ai ultimately serves your users with predictive, relevant and personalized search results that cater to the highest clicks and conversions.

How does SearchBoost.ai work?

SearchBoost.ai is a SaaS product that connects to both your data source and your search engine. SearchBoost.ai imports your user data and trains a Machine Learning model to produce better results. Once those results are ready, SearchBoost.ai pushes those results to your search engine like Apache Solr, Elastic, etc.

How does SearchBoost.ai use AI and Machine Learning?

Pairwise Scoring, AutoML and Markov Chain are some of the many models and techniques employed by SearchBoost.ai to produce the most optimal set of search results with the highest degrees of confidence.
